name: nobl9

attribution: This Pulumi package is based on the [`nobl9` Terraform Provider](https://github.com/nobl9/terraform-provider-nobl9).

settings, however an explicit `Provider` instance may be created and passed during resource
construction to achieve fine-grained programmatic control over provider settings. See the
[documentation](https://www.pulumi.com/docs/reference/programming-model/#providers) for more information.

nobl9:index/slo:Slo.description:
An SLO is a target value or range of values for a service that is measured by a service level indicator (SLI). SLOs allows you to define the reliability of your products and services in terms of customer expectations. You can create SLOs for user journeys, internal services, or even infrastructure.

For more information, refer to [SLO configuration documentation](https://docs.nobl9.com/yaml-guide#slo)

{{% examples %}}
## Example Usage
{{% example %}}

```java
package generated_program;

import com.pulumi.Context;
import com.pulumi.Pulumi;
import com.pulumi.core.Output;
import com.pulumi.nobl9.Project;
import com.pulumi.nobl9.ProjectArgs;
import com.pulumi.nobl9.Service;
import com.pulumi.nobl9.ServiceArgs;
import com.pulumi.nobl9.Slo;
import com.pulumi.nobl9.SloArgs;
import com.pulumi.nobl9.inputs.SloLabelArgs;
import com.pulumi.nobl9.inputs.SloAttachmentArgs;
import com.pulumi.nobl9.inputs.SloTimeWindowArgs;
import com.pulumi.nobl9.inputs.SloObjectiveArgs;
import com.pulumi.nobl9.inputs.SloIndicatorArgs;
import java.util.List;
import java.util.ArrayList;
import java.util.Map;
import java.io.File;
import java.nio.file.Files;
import java.nio.file.Paths;

public class App {
    public static void main(String[] args) {
        Pulumi.run(App::stack);
    }

    public static void stack(Context ctx) {
        var thisProject = new Project("thisProject", ProjectArgs.builder()        
            .displayName("Test N9 Terraform")
            .description("An example N9 Terraform project")
            .build());

        var thisService = new Service("thisService", ServiceArgs.builder()        
            .project(thisProject.name())
            .displayName(thisProject.displayName().applyValue(displayName -> String.format("%s Front Page", displayName)))
            .description("Front page service")
            .build());

        var thisSlo = new Slo("thisSlo", SloArgs.builder()        
            .service(thisService.name())
            .budgetingMethod("Occurrences")
            .project(thisProject.name())
            .labels(            
                SloLabelArgs.builder()
                    .key("env")
                    .values(                    
                        "dev",
                        "prod")
                    .build(),
                SloLabelArgs.builder()
                    .key("team")
                    .values("red")
                    .build())
            .attachments(            
                SloAttachmentArgs.builder()
                    .utl("https://www.nobl9.com/")
                    .displayName("SLO provider")
                    .build(),
                SloAttachmentArgs.builder()
                    .utl("https://duckduckgo.com/")
                    .displayName("Nice search engine")
                    .build())
            .alertPolicies("foo-front-page-latency")
            .timeWindow(SloTimeWindowArgs.builder()
                .unit("Day")
                .count(30)
                .isRolling(true)
                .build())
            .objectives(SloObjectiveArgs.builder()
                .name("tf-objective-1")
                .target(0.99)
                .displayName("OK")
                .value(2000)
                .op("gte")
                .rawMetrics(SloObjectiveRawMetricArgs.builder()
                    .queries(SloObjectiveRawMetricQueryArgs.builder()
                        .prometheuses(SloObjectiveRawMetricQueryPrometheusArgs.builder()
                            .promql("""
          latency_west_c7{code="ALL",instance="localhost:3000",job="prometheus",service="globacount"}
                            """)
                            .build())
                        .build())
                    .build())
                .build())
            .indicator(SloIndicatorArgs.builder()
                .name("test-terraform-prom-agent")
                .build())
            .build());

        var thisIndex_sloSlo = new Slo("thisIndex/sloSlo", SloArgs.builder()        
            .service(thisService.name())
            .budgetingMethod("Occurrences")
            .project(thisProject.name())
            .timeWindow(SloTimeWindowArgs.builder()
                .unit("Day")
                .count(30)
                .isRolling(true)
                .build())
            .objectives(SloObjectiveArgs.builder()
                .name("tf-objective-1")
                .target(0.99)
                .displayName("OK")
                .value(1)
                .countMetrics(SloObjectiveCountMetricArgs.builder()
                    .incremental(true)
                    .goods(SloObjectiveCountMetricGoodArgs.builder()
                        .prometheuses(SloObjectiveCountMetricGoodPrometheusArgs.builder()
                            .promql("1.0")
                            .build())
                        .build())
                    .totals(SloObjectiveCountMetricTotalArgs.builder()
                        .prometheuses(SloObjectiveCountMetricTotalPrometheusArgs.builder()
                            .promql("1.0")
                            .build())
                        .build())
                    .build())
                .build())
            .indicator(SloIndicatorArgs.builder()
                .name("test-terraform-prom-agent")
                .build())
            .build());

    }
}
```
```yaml
resources:
  thisProject:
    type: nobl9:Project
    properties:
      displayName: Test N9 Terraform
      description: An example N9 Terraform project
  thisService:
    type: nobl9:Service
    properties:
      project: ${thisProject.name}
      displayName: ${thisProject.displayName} Front Page
      description: Front page service
  thisSlo:
    type: nobl9:Slo
    properties:
      service: ${thisService.name}
      budgetingMethod: Occurrences
      project: ${thisProject.name}
      labels:
        - key: env
          values:
            - dev
            - prod
        - key: team
          values:
            - red
      attachments:
        - utl: https://www.nobl9.com/
          displayName: SLO provider
        - utl: https://duckduckgo.com/
          displayName: Nice search engine
      alertPolicies:
        - foo-front-page-latency
      timeWindow:
        unit: Day
        count: 30
        isRolling: true
      objectives:
        - name: tf-objective-1
          target: 0.99
          displayName: OK
          value: 2000
          op: gte
          rawMetrics:
            - queries:
                - prometheuses:
                    - promql: |2
                                  latency_west_c7{code="ALL",instance="localhost:3000",job="prometheus",service="globacount"}
      indicator:
        name: test-terraform-prom-agent
  thisIndex/sloSlo:
    type: nobl9:Slo
    properties:
      service: ${thisService.name}
      budgetingMethod: Occurrences
      project: ${thisProject.name}
      timeWindow:
        unit: Day
        count: 30
        isRolling: true
      objectives:
        - name: tf-objective-1
          target: 0.99
          displayName: OK
          value: 1
          countMetrics:
            - incremental: true
              goods:
                - prometheuses:
                    - promql: 1.0
              totals:
                - prometheuses:
                    - promql: 1.0
      indicator:
        name: test-terraform-prom-agent
```
